pullRequest.title: fix: Use ArrayList while creating ListDataProvider from items array
pullRequest.bodyText:
Wrapped the result of Arrays.asList(T... items) by java.util.ArrayList to support further add/remove operations through the DataView API without getting an UnsupportedOperationException.
Fix: #8761

commit.message: fix: Use java.util.ArrayList while creating ListDataProvider from items array
